messages.subject: Moderator's Help
messages.msgSnippet: I am unable to stay on line long enough to access my Yahoo account.  We are in the process of switching over to a new computer (and then brutally murdering
messages.messageBody:
I am unable to stay on line long enough to access my Yahoo account. We
are in the process of switching over to a new computer (and then brutally
murdering this old one with a sledge hammer) and I may or may not be
using the same server. Could one of the lovely and kind moderators unsub
me, please? I would appreciate it very much.

Thank you,
Deb L
